title: Down
description: A Skater is $down:down$ when part of the Skater’s body or equipment (aside from skates) is touching the floor. A Skater whose only contact with the floor (aside from skates) is one hand is not considered $down:down$. Once $down:down$, a Skater is considered $down:down$ until the Skater is $standing:standing$, stepping, or skating.
